definition: A professional who specializes in the installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems, typically found in residential, commercial, or industrial settings. They are skilled in handling various electrical components, wiring, and fixtures to ensure proper functioning and safety. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who work in the field of electrical engineering.

examples.german: Der Elektriker repariert die defekte Lampe.
examples.english: The electrician repairs the broken lamp.

examples.german: Mein Vater ist Elektriker und arbeitet in einer Fabrik.
examples.english: My father is an electrician and works in a factory.

examples.german: Der Elektriker installiert die neuen Steckdosen.
examples.english: The electrician installs the new power outlets.

examples.german: Ich habe einen Termin mit dem Elektriker, um meine elektrischen Probleme zu lösen.
examples.english: I have an appointment with the electrician to solve my electrical problems.

examples.german: Der Elektriker prüft die elektrische Verkabelung des Hauses.
examples.english: The electrician checks the electrical wiring of the house.
